quoteDoc: TERMS OF SERVICE AND PRIVACY POLICY + COOKIE/INFORMATION POLICY
quoteText:
Manybrain, Inc.
may use your personal information to contact you with newsletters, promotional material or company updates that may affect you, such as updates to its Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
You may unsubscribe at any time from any of these emails.
title: You can opt out of promotional communications
